DOC.brief_summary: Studies laboratory model indicate dietary methionine restriction ( MR ) enhance longevity produce short- long-term metabolic change consistent healthy lifespan . The present study design establish level dietary methionine methionine cysteine induce physiological change healthy adult like observed rodent study .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Methionine Cysteine Restriction Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: In control feeding study , subject randomize one two experimental . Group A ( N=10 ) : start control diet ( 31 mg/kg/day Met ; 31 mg/kg/day Cys ) 4 week follow washout 3-4 week , 70 % MR diet ( 9.3 mg/kg/day Met ; 40.3 mg/kg/day SAA ) 4 week , follow 3-4 week washout period 90 % MR diet ( 3.1 mg/kg/day Met ; 34.1 mg/kg/day SAA ) 4 week . Group B ( N=10 ) : start control diet ( 31 mg/kg/day Met ; 31 mg/kg/day Cys ) 4 week follow washout 3-4 week 50 % methionine cysteine restrict ( M/CR ) diet ( 15.5 mg/kg/day Met ; 15.5 mg/kg/day Cys ; 31 mg/kg/day SAA ) , follow 3-4 week washout period 65 % M/CR diet ( 10.8 mg/kg/day Met ; 10.8 mg/kg/day Cys ; 21.6 mg/kg/day SAA ) 4 week .
DOC.criteria: Healthy English speak male female volunteer May may student Age range 2465 year Subjects need normal weight moderately overweight ( BMI 18.535 kg/m2 ) Subjects nonsmokers No use medication know impact biomarkers interest Pregnancy lactate woman Persons document diabetes No use high dose dietary antioxidant supplement fish oil/flax seed oil nacetylcysteine least 1 month prior study Use tobacco product past 6 month Unstable weight Individuals allergy egg , wheat , nut , soy latex Individuals phenylketonuria ( PKU )
